mapper.select: select a.catenum catenum, catename, catesort, cateimg, mcatenum, mcatename, mcatesort from category a join mcategory b on a.catenum = b.catenum order by catesort, mcatesort

select count(realpayment) todayNum, SUM(realpayment) todayMoney from ordertbl where ordernum in (select ordernum from orderdetail where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid = '${userid}')) and to_char(orderdate, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')

select ordernum, od.productnum productnum, productname, mc.mcatenum mcatenum, orderquantity, to_char(orderconfirm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') orderconfirm, orderprice, mc.mcatename mcatename from (select ordernum, a.productnum, productname, b.mcatenum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, userid, orderstatus from (select ordernum, productnum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, orderstatus from orderdetail) a join product b on a.productnum = b.productnum ) od join mcategory mc on od.mcatenum = mc.mcatenum where userid='${userid}'
and od.productnum in
${item}
and orderstatus='구매확정' and orderconfirm between #{startCalendarDataValue} and #{endCalendarDataValue} order by orderconfirm asc, ordernum asc

select count(productnum) from (select ordernum, a.productnum, productname, b.mcatenum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, userid, orderstatus from (select ordernum, productnum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, orderstatus from orderdetail) a join product b on a.productnum = b.productnum ) od join mcategory mc on od.mcatenum = mc.mcatenum where userid=#{param1} and orderstatus='구매확정' order by orderconfirm desc, ordernum desc
